sentence: Why is it impossible to starve in the desert? because of the sand which is there.
explanation: 1) Material consisting of small particles (usually used in construction). 2) A type of grainy substance that can also create a more complex form of a sandwich.
first_new_sentence: Sand is used in construction to create concrete and other building materials.
second_new_sentence: The chef prepared a delightful sandwhich for lunch.

sentence: What did the tie say to the neck? i think ill just hang around.
explanation: 1) To suspend or attach something from above so it falls freely down. 2) To spend time relaxing or socializing.
first_new_sentence: We decided to hang the picture frame on the wall.
second_new_sentence: After work, I like to hang out with my friends at the cafe.

sentence: In these examples, sand and hang both fit the criteria of having different meanings while being spelled the same in the context of the jokes.
